Hi folks,

I've a situation about order.xml. In order.xml there is a <date>=
 attribute under <meta> parent-tag. We can change this manually but i want =
to change this as automatically. This date value should be got from system =
date before the crawler started. Likewise, folder names of crawl ( logs, ch=
eckpoints ) can be changed as automatically. In default, logs folder is spe=
cified as :

<string name=3D"logs-path">logs</string>

But this can be chan=
ged as automatically in the sameway as writer-processors suffix attribute. =
Suffix attribute in writer processor is :

<string name=3D"suffix">${HOSTNA=
ME}</string> 

Hostname is defined at run time. So, i want this method to u=
se to define log folder name at run time.

Thanks.
